original_title: 俺をゴミクズ扱いしイジめた野球部マネージャーがデリヘル嬢に成り下がり…ククッ！錆びついた俺のバットで特濃中出し大逆転ホームランを打ってやった話。
overview: "Don't make an error, sit down on your knees." The manager of the baseball club who bullied me with the captain is now a delivery health lady! Hide your face with a hood, take a sneak shot of a blowjob as a threat, and then spoil it! "How do you feel about sucking Gomikusu's cock, senior?" When I Shake It With A Video And Train It... The Dependent Senior Became My Dedicated Pet Who Treated Me As Trash, "Please Cum In My Trash Can."
title: The Baseball Team Manager Who Used To Treat Me Like Trash And Bully Me Is Now A Callgirl…Hehe! How I Reversed The Game And Hit A Home Run Creampie With My Rusted ‘Bat’. Mei Mizuki
